scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run start:dev" "cd web && npm run start"
scripts.precommit: concurrently "npx lint-staged" "cd ./server && npm run test:cov && exit" "cd web && CI=true npm run test:cov"
scripts.test:server: cd ./server && npm run lint && npm run test:cov && exit
scripts.test:web: cd ./web && npm run lint && CI=true npm run test:cov
